sections.description: WooNuxt is unmatched when it comes to performance and scalability. Reap the benefits of having a online store that out performs all of your competitors.
sections.changelog:
2.2.1

Update WP GraphQL Headless Login version to 0.4.3.

2.2.0

Major security and code quality improvements: Enhanced AJAX security with nonces, comprehensive input sanitization, improved error handling, standardized function naming with woonuxt_ prefix, proper DocBlocks, better JavaScript error handling, and overall code organization.

2.0.1

Update plugin and software versions.

2.0.0

Move to Headless Login for WPGraphQL.

1.0.58

Improve Stripe add payment option.

1.0.57

Update plugin versions.

1.0.56

Add currencySymbol. Fix Vercel url

1.0.55

Ceil maxPrice value.

1.0.54

Change to setup_intents.

1.0.53

Add stripePaymentIntent for 3d secure.

1.0.52

Bump version.

1.0.51

Inhance Social media fileds and schema.

1.0.50

Add SEO settings

1.0.49

Add functionality to increase max query amount if there are more than 100 products

1.0.45

Fix error when WooCommerce is disabled or not installed
